main event: An observer sighted a low flying object in Cassopolis, Michigan on August 21, 1958.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 4 minutes,The object was reported to have a unique color and irregular shape,The witness indicated that the object seemed to follow them as they walked,The object was described as self-luminous and larger than a star,The conclusion of the report suggested it could be a possible Echo II.
witness description: A male observer who was walking back home from Cassopolis college.
